cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.27, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, n_s=0.965, A_s=2e-09)
a_arr = np.linspace(0.1, 1, 100)
chi_from_ccl = ccl.background.comoving_radial_distance(cosmo, a_arr)
hoh0_from_ccl = ccl.background.h_over_h0(cosmo, a_arr)
growth_from_ccl = ccl.background.growth_factor(cosmo, a_arr)
fgrowth_from_ccl = ccl.background.growth_rate(cosmo, a_arr)
cosmo_input = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.27, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, n_s=0.965,
    A_s=2e-09)
cosmo_input._set_background_from_arrays(a_array=a_arr, chi_array=
    chi_from_ccl, hoh0_array=hoh0_from_ccl)
cosmo_input._set_growth_from_arrays(a_array=a_arr, growth_array=
    growth_from_ccl, fgrowth_array=fgrowth_from_ccl)
a_arr = np.linspace(0.102, 0.987, 158)
chi_ccl_input = ccl.background.comoving_radial_distance(cosmo_input, a_arr)
chi_from_ccl = ccl.background.comoving_radial_distance(cosmo, a_arr)
assert np.allclose(chi_ccl_input, chi_from_ccl, atol=0.0, rtol=1e-05)
growth_ccl_input = ccl.background.growth_factor(cosmo_input, a_arr)
growth_from_ccl = ccl.background.growth_factor(cosmo, a_arr)
assert np.allclose(growth_ccl_input, growth_from_ccl, atol=0.0, rtol=1e-05)
fgrowth_ccl_input = ccl.background.growth_rate(cosmo_input, a_arr)
fgrowth_from_ccl = ccl.background.growth_rate(cosmo, a_arr)
assert np.allclose(fgrowth_ccl_input, fgrowth_from_ccl, atol=0.0, rtol=1e-05)
